Class MapViewerOverlay

  • java.lang.Object
    • ItemizedOverlay
      • com.airs.visualisations.MapViewerOverlay

  • public class MapViewerOverlay
extends ItemizedOverlay
    Class to implement the overlay of GI/VI sensors in the Map View

      • draw

        public void draw(Canvas canvas,
        MapView mapView,
        boolean shadow)
        Draws the overlay items on the Map View
        Parameters:
        canvas - Reference to the Canvas being drawn on
        mapView - Reference to the MapView that this overlay appears on
        shadow - draw shadow (true) or not (false) under the overlay item
